NEW: The Ford government is scaling back the number of long-term care beds it will build over course of its first mandate.   The government promised 15,000 beds in 5 years (2018-2023)  Now, LTC sources admit they will only deliver 4,000 (new and redeveloped) in 2022.   #onpoli
